sections.heading: Imposition
sections.text: of tax in certain counties.

sections.heading: Effective
sections.text: date of tax imposed pursuant toNRS 373.030.

sections.heading: Imposition
sections.text:
of tax on diesel fuel in certain counties whose population is less than

100,000; rate; approval of board of county commissioners or voters; increases

in the tax; effective date of the tax; exemption.

sections.heading: Additional
Additional
sections.text:
taxes in certain counties whose population is 100,000 or more but less than

700,000: Imposition; rates and annual increases; approval of voters; effective

dates.

sections.heading: Additional
Taxes
sections.text:
imposed pursuant toNRS 373.066or373.0663: Distribution and use of

proceeds; temporary prohibition of penalties and interest; annual review.

sections.heading: Taxes
sections.text:
imposed pursuant toNRS 373.0663:

Distribution of certain portion of proceeds to State Highway Fund for state

highway projects in county in which tax collected.

sections.heading: Taxes
sections.text:
imposed pursuant toNRS 373.066or373.0663: Exemptions; effect on other fuel

provisions of ordinance imposing tax; applicability of certain provisions

sections.heading: Mandatory
sections.text: provision of amendatory ordinance.

sections.text: to counties of taxes collected by Department; reimbursement for costs.

sections.heading: Returns
sections.text:
by persons using special fuels; reimbursements for taxes paid; duty of

sections.text: and use of net proceeds of taxes; regional street and highway fund.

sections.text:
on repeal, amendment or modification of ordinance imposing tax; dissolution of

sections.text:
of cost of project by issuance of revenue bonds and other securities and direct

sections.heading: Evaluation
sections.text:
and approval by commission of project for construction, surfacing or
